channel.title: Batch File Help
channel.description:
Why Won't This Code work :S _______________________________________________________________
[code]Title Ultimate RuneScape Private Server Startup @Echo Off Color 2 Cls
If Exist "C:\Program Files\"\Java Goto 32Bit If Exist "C:\Program Files (86x)"\Java Goto 64Bit (Goto Error)
:Error Title You Don't Have Java Installed! Start http://www.oracle.com/index.html Echo You Need To Install Java! Pause Exit
:32Bit Color A Title [Detected 32Bit] Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui Echo /Please Close This Box\ Exit
:64Bit Color A Title [Detected 64Bit] "C:/Program Files/java/jre6/bin/javaw" -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 Echo /Please Close This Box\ Exit[/code]

item.title: Batch File Help
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Riot Owner-Riot
item.description:
@Owner-Riot wrote:

Why Won’t This Code work :S

[code]Title Ultimate RuneScape Private Server Startup
@Echo Off
Color 2
Cls

If Exist “C:\Program Files”\Java Goto 32Bit
If Exist “C:\Program Files (86x)”\Java Goto 64Bit
(Goto Error)

:Error
Title You Don’t Have Java Installed!
Start http://www.oracle.com/index.html
Echo You Need To Install Java!
Pause
Exit

:32Bit
Color A
Title [Detected 32Bit]
Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
Echo /Please Close This Box
Exit

:64Bit
Color A
Title [Detected 64Bit]
“C:/Program Files/java/jre6/bin/javaw” -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32
Echo /Please Close This Box
Exit[/code]

Read full topic
